name: Hulbert RUSSELL v. WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (Cooper BESSEMER). Appeal of Cooper BESSEMER
name_abbreviation: Russell v. Workmen's Compensation Appeal Board

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, Justice, participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Rule of Judicial Administration 701(f).
parties: Hulbert RUSSELL v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (Cooper BESSEMER). Appeal of Cooper BESSEMER.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, Justice, participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Rule of Judicial Administration 701(f).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Carl J. Smith, Jr., for Cooper Bessemer.
Barbara E. Holmes, Samuel S. Blaufeld, Pamela M. Schiller, for H. Russell.
Norman R. Haigh, Secretary, for W.C.A.B.
casebody.head_matter:
667 A.2d 1123
Hulbert RUSSELL v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (Cooper BESSEMER). Appeal of Cooper BESSEMER.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 20, 1995.
Decided Dec. 19, 1995.
Carl J. Smith, Jr., for Cooper Bessemer.
Barbara E. Holmes, Samuel S. Blaufeld, Pamela M. Schiller, for H. Russell.
Norman R. Haigh, Secretary, for W.C.A.B.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
